General: - Rope climb speed increased from 11 to 13
- Rope activation range increased from 2.2m to 2.4m
- Fixed an HTML parsing exploit with builds

Infernus: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20} Flame Dash now has 30% Slow Resistance
Ivy: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Air Drop|Size=20} Air Drop self cast time reduced from 2 to 1.3
Seven: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Storm Cloud|Size=20} Storm Cloud: Spirit Power DPS scaling reduced from 0.8 to 0.7
Viscous: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20} Puddle Punch base cast range from 60m to 40m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20} Puddle Punch T2 damage from +50 to +35
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20} Puddle Punch base cooldown increased from 24 to 28
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20} Puddle Punch now knocks people less high into the air
- Base clip reduced from 24 to 20, Alt Fire now requires 5 bullets
